de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.datastore

Interface DataStoreListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTooltipVisualization, BubbleVisualization.Instance, ClusterOrderVisualization.Instance, ClusterOutlineVisualization.Instance, ClusterParallelMeanVisualization.Instance, COPVectorVisualization.Instance, DistanceFunctionVisualization.Instance, LineVisualization.Instance, MarkerVisualization.Instance, PolygonVisualization.Instance, RTreeParallelVisualization.Instance, SelectionConvexHullVisualization.Instance, SelectionDotVisualization.Instance, SelectionLineVisualization.Instance, SelectionTableWindow, ThumbnailVisualization, TooltipScoreVisualization.Instance, TooltipStringVisualization.Instance, TreeMBRVisualization.Instance, TreeSphereVisualization.Instance, VisualizerContext

    public interface DataStoreListener
extends EventListener
    Defines the interface for an object that listens to changes in a DataStore.
    See Also:
    DataStore, DataStoreEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void contentChanged(DataStoreEvent e)
      Invoked after objects of the datastore have been updated, inserted or removed in some way.
